name: get_patent_overview_by_text_query
description: Search for patent application overviews using a query string of the format 'applicationMetaData.inventionTitle:your_search_term', where your_search_term is the case-insensitive keyword or keyphrase you are searching for. If your_search_term is a multi-word phrase, it must be encased in escaped double quotation marks for exact matching. This tool allows for sorting, offsetting, and filterin of results. Returns a list of important metadata fields for each application, including application number, filing date, grant date, invention title, and CPC classifications.

query.description: Keyword or keyphrase to search for in the patent application title. This field is required.

exact_match.description: If true, the search will only return results that exactly match the provided query. Default is false.

sort.description: Sorts results by one of the following fields: filingDate or grantDate. Follow the field name with a space and 'asc' or 'desc' for ascending or descending by date, respectively. For example: 'filingDate desc'

offset.description: The starting position (zero-indexed) of the result set. Default is 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 25.

rangeFilters.description: Limits results to the date range specified for one of the following fields: filingDate or grantDate. Provide the field name, a space, and a colon-separated start and end value in YYYY-MM-DD format. For example: 'grantDate 2010-01-01:2011-01-01'

error.description: (if present) Error message if the request fails

details.description: (if present) Additional details about the error if the request fails

count.description: Total number of matching patent applications

applicationNumberText.description: The application number of the patent

filingDate.description: The filing date of the application (YYYY-MM-DD format)

grantDate.description: The grant date of the patent (YYYY-MM-DD format)

applicationStatusDescriptionText.description: Current status description of the application

cpcClassificationBag.description: CPC classification codes for the patent

grantDocumentMetaData.description: Contains patent grant zip and xml file meta data for an application

zipFileName.description: Name of the zip file containing the grant data

productIdentifier.description: Product identifier for the grant data

fileLocationURI.description: URI location of the grant file

fileCreateDateTime.description: Date and time when the file was created

xmlFileName.description: Name of the XML file containing the grant data

firstInventorToFileIndicator.description: (if present) Indicates whether this application was the first inventor to file

parentPatentNumber.description: (if present) Patent number of the parent application

parentApplicationStatusCode.description: Status code of the parent application

claimParentageTypeCode.description: Code indicating the type of parent relationship

claimParentageTypeCodeDescriptionText.description: Description of the parent relationship type

parentApplicationStatusDescriptionText.description: Status description of the parent application

parentApplicationNumberText.description: Application number of the parent application

parentApplicationFilingDate.description: Filing date of the parent application (YYYY-MM-DD format)

childApplicationNumberText.description: Application number of the child application of this parent application, which is the current application

childApplicationStatusCode.description: Status code of the child application

parentApplicationNumberText.description: Application number of the parent application

childApplicationNumberText.description: Application number of the child application

childApplicationStatusDescriptionText.description: Status description of the child application

childApplicationFilingDate.description: Filing date of the child application (YYYY-MM-DD format)

firstInventorToFileIndicator.description: Indicates if this application was the first inventor to file

childPatentNumber.description: Patent number of the child application

claimParentageTypeCode.description: Code indicating the type of parent relationship

claimParentageTypeCodeDescriptionText.description: Description of the parent relationship type

requestIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the API request

name: get_patent_application_metadata
description: Retrieves only the metadata for a specific patent application by its application number.

applicationNumberText.description: The application number of the patent.

error.description: (if present) Error message if the request fails

details.description: (if present) Additional details about the error if the request fails

count.description: Total number of matching patent applications

items.description: Field that was not present in the response

missing_fields.description: List of fields that were not present in the response

applicationNumberText.description: The application number of the patent

firstInventorToFileIndicator.description: Indicates whether this is the first inventor to file (Y/N)

applicationStatusCode.description: Numeric code for the application status

applicationTypeCode.description: Code for the type of application (e.g., UTL for Utility)

filingDate.description: The filing date of the application (YYYY-MM-DD format)

grantDate.description: The grant date of the patent (YYYY-MM-DD format)

cpcClassificationBag.description: CPC classification codes for the patent

applicationTypeLabelName.description: Label name for the application type

applicationStatusDate.description: Date of the application status (YYYY-MM-DD format)

applicationStatusDescriptionText.description: Current status description of the application

requestIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the API request

name: get_patent_term_adjustment_data
description: Obtains the patent term adjustment details for a given application number.
